name: 視訊通訊
description:
1. Introduction to basic digital video coding and applications of the communication
2. Compression fundamental
3. International still image coding standard
4. Motion estimation/compression and hybrid coding system
5. International video coding standards
6. Digital video transcoding
7. Digital video communication and error concealment/resilience
8. Scalable video coding
goals: 使學習者認識視訊通訊理論
使學習者了解視訊通訊相關產業近況
使學習者具備視訊通訊相關應用之實作能力
syllabus:
Week 1 – Course introduction: goals and requirements  
Week 2 – Introduction  
Week 3 – Basic digital video coding and its applications in communication (1/2)  
Week 4 – Basic digital video coding and its applications in communication (2/2)  
Week 5 – Compression fundamental (1/2)  
Week 6 – Compression fundamental (2/2)  
Week 7 – International still image coding standard  
Week 8 – Motion estimation/compression and hybrid coding system (1/2)  
Week 9 – Motion estimation/compression and hybrid coding system (2/2)  
Week 10 – Discussion: midterm project  
Week 11 – H.264 video coding standards (1/2)  
Week 12 – H.264 video coding standards (2/2)  
Week 13 – Scalable video coding (1/2)  
Week 14 – Scalable video coding (2/2)  
Week 15 – Digital video communication and error concealment/resilience  
Week 16 – Digital video transcoding  
Week 17 – Discussion: current research topics  
Week 18 – Final exam

methodologies.note: 講解視訊通訊之原理、歷史與未來發展及相關應用。
以專題報告方式進行專業知識討論與交流。
以程式實作方式了解視訊通訊之原理及應用。

grading.note: 課程專業知識之期末測驗。
課程專業知識之口頭報告。
